title: Fudge Glaze
directions: Cook 4 oz. semisweet chocolate, 1/4 cup corn syrup, 2 Tbsp. unsalted butter, 2 Tbsp. water and 1/8 tsp. salt over medium-low heat, stirring until melted, about 5 minutes. Makes 3/4 cup.
ingredients: 4 ounces semisweet chocolate $Click to see savings
2 tablespoons unsalted butter $Click to see savings
